708170.name: OMSI 2 Add-on Express 91.06
708170.description:
The add-on "Express 91.06" is a semi-fictitious French map that will allow you to discover the express line 91.06. It starts at the bus station of Massy Palaiseau in France and allows you to cross a plateau inspired by the French Silicon Valley passing by companies, universities, R & D laboratories and a lot more. Enjoy the two challenging routes with travel time ranging from 15 minutes to 1 hour!


  • Two lines with a travel time ranging from 15 minutes to 1 hour.
  • Difficult hours, comprehensive ridership.
  • Discover the pleasure of playing several types of lines.
  • Unique decor, with more than 100 new objects!
